replies.name: November 17, 2023
replies.content: A couple of people I follow (Manuel, Henrique) have done these App Defaults posts over the last week or so, and I thought it was fun kind of exercise, so here’s mine: 📨 Mail Client: Fastmail web (personal)/Outlook (work) 📮 Mail Server Fastmail (personal)/Exchange (work) 📝 Notes: Notes.app + iA Writer ✅ To-Do: iA writer 📷 iPhone Photo Shooting: Camera.app 🟦 Photo Management: Photos.app 📆 Calendar: Fastmail web (personal)/Outlook (work) 📁 Cloud File Storage: iCloud (personal)/Box (work) 📖 RSS: Feedbin + Reeder 🙍🏻‍♂️ Contacts: Contacts.app 🌐 Browser: Arc 💬 Chat: Messages + Signal + WhatsApp 🔖 Bookmarks: Linkding 📑 Read It Later: None, really. I just use my bookmarks in Linkding 📜 Word Processing: Pages/Word 📈 Spreadsheets: Excel/Numbers 📊 Presentations: Keynote (sometimes PowerPoint if I have to 🤢) 🛒 Shopping Lists: Notes.app 🍴 Meal Planning: 🤷🏻‍♂️ 💰 Budgeting and Personal Finance: Numbers 📰 News: The web? 🎵 Music: Apple Music 🎤 Podcasts: Overcast 🔐 Password Management: 1Password 🤖 Code Editing: Nova 📚 Books: Kindle
